entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Thursday 20 April 2023
